meanings.definition: Of extremely poor quality or taste; cheap or inferior.
meanings.sent1: The movie we watched last night was the schlockiest film I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The schlockiest items at the dollar store always fall apart after one use.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe someone would actually buy such a schlockiest painting for their living room.
meanings.sent4: The schlockiest decorations at the party made it look like a scene from a bad movie.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the schlockiest pizza I ever had still lingers in my mouth.

meanings.definition: The most inferior or lowest quality.
meanings.sent1: In the bargain bin, you can find the schlockiest of all the DVDs.
meanings.sent2: The store owner refused to sell the schlockiest products due to their poor quality.
meanings.sent3: The garage sale had a table full of schlockiest items that no one wanted to buy.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house was filled with the schlockiest furniture you could imagine.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed the schlockiest artifacts from ancient times.
